name: Crazy Knife Hit Shooter
description:
- Features:
+ Simple and fun gameplay but very addictive.
+ Cool graphic effects.
+ Music by Bendsound.com

- How to play:
+ Tap to shoot the knife.
+ Hit the target and get scores.
+ Don't miss the target!
+ The target give you 1 point.
+ Hit apples give you 5 points.
+ Find hidden objects and hit them, you can get 10 points.
+ Get the highest score.
+ As the name of the game, the targets are crazy. So be patient!

Challenge your friends and yourself.

Have fun and enjoy the game.
